title: Yasuo is officially the Vayne of season 6
body:
Why do I say this?Champion is mentioned practically everyday on these very boards,Broken and frustrating(except he is balanced just frustrating),Riot will give no care to Yasuo to any ups and downs

But don't worry closer to pre season they're going to nerf his base AD by 3 just like they did with Vayne..

replies.body:
More like the vayne of a week now.

These posts broke out like the plague.
yasuo has been out for almost 3 years, and now out of no where hes  " broken as fuck"

It's because there isn't anything truly broken right now to whine about. 
when in doubt
go after some champion that has a 

-high playrate
-is frustrating
-can carry a game

they aren't broken. 
hec was, but he got nerfed.

Hecarim lost 10 damage on his Q at all ranks.

That literally didn't do shit. He is still way too strong, or maybe other junglers need to be better since Hecarim is one of few junglers who can actually gank with the vision control that people have at higher elos. One or the other honestly.

https://champion.gg/champion/Hecarim/Jungle
hecarim looks fine right now

Note that the patch hasn't been here for even a week, so the data really isn't that reliable especially since it's high elo only, and statistics are kept from last patch until enough games are played (FYI, 125+ Hecarim's have 57% winrate this patch, but I doubt that's reliable information).

Actually that is a bigger hit than you think considering he spams the hell out of that skill, and he is generally only oppressive during the earlygame phases unless he is fed (which is where 10 damage can make all the difference).
Except monster camp resistances, and base resistances of most champions for that matter, completely shave off that 10 damage anyway. In reality he lost maybe 3 points of damage per Q.
never said that they are broken, they have a good popularity (specially yasuo) and hecarim got nerfed but he is still strong enough . not OP/broken. both are just strong.
49% win rate in plat+ korea is not strong.

Or is all three in Yasuo's case. An insanely high playright accompanying a very high winrate is a sure sign something is wrong.

he's got a 10% play rate for mid and top. that's not insanely high in the slightest. his mid and top win rate is 50% and 53%. again, not OP at all.

people are just complaining for the sake of complaning.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackGuilmon,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mxwNE7b5,comment-id=0001000000000002000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-02T09:17:45.545+0000)

That's diamond.

Not according to champion.gg
https://champion.gg/champion/Yasuo/Middle
look at yasuo top too.

Uhm...Yasuo has been complained about almost (emphasis on _almost_) as long as he has existed.  He is a very heavily disliked champion by a fairly large amount of people (mostly because of wind walls sheer existence, although the sheer amount of mobility, even if it is fairly conditional, definitely doesn't help peoples opinions of him).

It's not out of nowhere, he's always been annoying. Not OP, just really annoying.

Same thing with Fizz. Everyone knows he's annoying, and he's always been annoying. There are certain times where there may be spikes in "Fizz broken" or whatever threads, but he's still frustrating to play against.

The irony is that Vayne complainers often got stomped by a good Vayne when she was in a bad spot. (And Vayne has been in some shitty spots.)

Yasuo could literally be the worst champ in the game by every statistic and people would still want him removed.
Zed nerfed?better cry about Azir.Azir nerfed?better cry about Yas and so on..i quess ahri is next?
Yeah. Her Q does not need MS. Nerf her to the ground... if you know what i mean - Future Complainers

only thing vayne is easier to play and does more dmg while having range has an ability to tell ur bruiser to fck off her and then burst him with 6hits in 3secs. Before you defend vayne no she isnt broken she is poorly designed and really fucking annoying to deal with if you are even remotely *EVEN* with her after lane phase. Yasuo just goes in 
Is he fed? = he kills people usually dies.
Is he unfed?= he gets killed
Now vayne is 
Is she fed?=she kills everything as long as the enemy doesnt have a point and click spell that does 900dmg or a 2.5sec CC
Is she unfed?= she dies b4 the fight starts cause that's what Vayne mains do.
But vayne can just go into 30mins *afk* farming and then just sit behind and anhilate any frontliners with no effort. It's no suprice you see all thse vaynes in soloque going from 0-3 to 10-4 in most games because they got 2 items and now thye can fuck up any frontliner and 1v1 most ppl who dont have 5+ kills on her. And no she isnt mechanicly demanding anyone that is plat level adc mechanics can play her great the only thing that seperates high elo vaynes and mid elo vaynes is the usage of Condemm and the usage of the stealth on the ultimate(jukes,dodging spells) Nah i'm not salty i could not care less about that trash champ all ik is if i have a vayne on my team im insta dodging.
this is one of the most stupid comment ive ever seen
Yeah a bronze 1 player know's much more about champions that a ex d2 all arounder withe experience in every lane.
Boom roasted.

it's not about roasting. it's like me going to tell a car mechanic that his idea of fixing a car is stupid you don't do that. specially if you are in a division that even a kid with mild autism can achieve with some effort(no hate towards autism)
I know your idea wasn't roasting, but it really worked.

no it didn't worked 1 : because he have no information about how much account i might have and either or not i might be a higher rank than him so yeah actualy i am d1 with my main so i can understand just perfectly what he was trying to explain.
2: he said something very very very very stupid which my no sense and i cringed so hard i had to comment about his stupid bullshit. 

P.S. now thats called roasting FYI

Yeah man ofc you are diamond 1 like everyone on this game and you have 50% win rate on a bronze acc with 3.5 kda. man dont pull bs on me nobody can be that average on a bronze acc even tho it only has such a few games. Unless you reverse boosted which is bannable fyi. I can get a 10kda on platinum effortless and you mean to tell me that a player that is currently *above* me has that on bronze nah. YOUS A JOKE MATE(thug argo much kappa) cya aint spending time on you

lol get all emotional all you want, it won't change facts, i mean just use logic and you will understand this is not an account i use very much eh.. so thats mean yeah its pretty much the account i use only on boards now because of peoples like you who are toxic as hell and dunno what they are talking about your just a big voice with no brain and its funny. get rekt again
i can smell how triggered you are from here.
you were so easy to rekt it wasnt satisfying enough maybe thats why you get a impression of triggers "LUL"
P.S.S. that is actually called trash english. I don't know wether your account is diamond 1 master or challenger, but you ain't gonna roast anyone saying "which my no sense".
Easier than no skill is still no skill son.

the account is permabanned(dominusx) after my tilt where i lost tons of divisions and flamed. i only play with friends and a bit on whirlingdeathx which is banned from the forums 2 years ago so i can only talk through here. PS: i know eune is trash that's why i'm leveling on EUW again cause i sold a dia acc i had there for battlefield 4 premium. cheers bud.

You actually bring a point yet people down vote, I mean you can buy armor and health  against a yasou. You can probably outrun him in river even. If yasou get's dived, the fuck is he going to do? Dash into you?

my dear friend people dont care about points it only matters when rito says it or someone with tons of upvotes does. I have better game knowledge than most even tho my mechanics are dropping off due to playing in low elo like diamond 5 what i've learned is it only matters if rito senpai say's it. Otherwhise ppl wouldnt be toxic aswell... people are toxic because of the automated system banning only flamers and not the cause of the flame. people become toxic smurf and smash low elo that's the game right now. you either get fucked over from trolls or bad champion balance ... and on top of that retarded que times. so you make a smurf to have fun again and the game becomes an uneven fuck fest with smurfs everywhere.

Yasuo has an overloaded kit. The reason that he's getting hate is because other members of the "overloaded kit club" like {{champion:245}} have been nerfed.

I don't think he's OP at all but I completely understand why people are frustrated playing against a resourceless champ that breaks the cardinal rule of resourceless champs - being CD dependant. Having a base cd of under 50 seconds on his ultimate at level 16 and a Q that can get it's CD reduced just by leveling up means that neither of these things are true (yasuo's aspd growth contributes to steel tempest's CDR). Then you have an E that basically has no CD as long as you have a unique target, and it turns out he only actually is gated by a single CD, and it's Windwall.

Don't even get me started on all the invisible power in his kit. =/

I honestly think he's pretty balanced on early and mid game, late game he's probably the champion with the most dmg potential in the whole roster, even more than Jax :/

double crit chance, shield, cc, windwall duration and width, built in armor pen, and crazy amounts of mobility... I mean, come on.

> [{quoted}](name=Hige,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mxwNE7b5,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-08-01T19:56:43.597+0000)
>
> I honestly think he's pretty balanced on early and mid game, late game he's probably the champion with the most dmg potential in the whole roster, even more than Jax :/
> 
> double crit chance, shield, cc, windwall duration and width, built in armor pen, and crazy amounts of mobility... I mean, come on.

It's just the he's fuckin obnoxious to boot.

Hold the fuck up.  People whine about Yasuo for a few days (in threads that don't even have that many upvotes last I checked" and suddenly he's "the new Vayne"?  What the fuck is with people and wanting to be some kind of prophet before dust even settles?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Naw, I'd compare him to lucian a few weeks ago.  Someone "realized" that yas is op, and suddenly everyone is realizing it.  They'll forget about it in a week or two.  And move onto, oh, fiddlesticks, or somethin.

I agree just don't compare them to Riven. Riven s3 players were worse than s5 vaynes + s6 yasuos put together
